data.title: US Patent Issued to MURATA MANUFACTURING on May 7 for "Piezoelectric device" (Japanese Inventors)
meta_keywords: US Patent Issued to MURATA MANUFACTURING on May 7 for
data.meta_description: US Patent Issued to MURATA MANUFACTURING on May 7 for
data.text:
Posted On: 2024-05-08

ALEXANDRIA, Va., May 8 -- United States Patent no. 11,979,713, issued on May 7, was assigned to MURATA MANUFACTURING Co. LTD. (Kyoto, Japan).

"Piezoelectric device" was invented by Seiji Umezawa (Nagaokakyo, Japan), Matti Liukku (Nagaokakyo, Japan), Ville-Pekka Rytkonen (Nagaokakyo, Japan), Anssi Blomqvist (Nagaokakyo, Japan), Shinsuke Ikeuchi (Nagaokakyo, Japan), Fumiya Kurokawa (Nagaokakyo, Japan) and Masayuki Suzuki (Nagaokakyo, Japan).

According to the abstract* released by the U.S. Patent & Trademark Office: "A piezoelectric device includes a connecting section connecting a pair of beam sections adjacent to each other. The connecting section is connected to one of the pair of beam sections at a first end portion. The connecting secti...
